label: High-energy tension -> 0
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: High-energy tension -> 0. Validation: QGP behavior at Big Bang
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288 - E8 x E8 root system
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144 - Effective Euler characteristic

# Asymptotic freedom: coupling vanishes at high energy
# In PM framework: tension distributed over root lattice -> 0 at infinity
alpha_s_high_E = chi / (roots ** 2)  # Vanishing coupling ratio
verified = alpha_s_high_E < 0.01     # Approaches zero
